entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
